name: Cryptographic Purge & Credential Rotation
desc: Execute BFG Repo-Cleaner to scrub all .env, .jsonl, and PID artifacts from Git history and enforce zero-trust credential rotation.

name: GHAS & CI/CD Pipeline Hardening
desc: Integrate GitHub Advanced Security, SAST, Dependabot, and Renovate bots to block merges failing vulnerability or secret scans.

name: Heady Hive SDK Standardization
desc: Standardize heady-hive-sdk as the mandatory routing, budgeting, and receipt-generating library for all model interactions.

name: MCP Verified Connector Studio
desc: Enforce default-deny tool allowlists and mandatory JSON schema argument validation for all MCP plugins to secure the moat.

name: Policy Plane Activation (Human-on-the-Loop)
desc: Transition HeadyValidator to enforce user-facing interstitial approval queues for high-stakes autonomous execution.

name: Qdrant H3VP Memory Solidification
desc: Eliminate fallbacks and make Qdrant-backed H3VP memory highly available with strict query, export, and delete capabilities.

name: FinOps Budget Router Execution
desc: Implement a cost-aware routing engine that delegates simple tasks to local models (Ollama) and reserves high-tier APIs for deep reasoning.

name: Immutable 'Proof View' Receipts
desc: Generate cryptographic receipts for every action showing intent, routing decisions, tools executed, and exact transaction costs.

name: Corporate Procurement Agent Packs
desc: Develop vertical-specific orchestration bundles for corporate procurement and SRE incident response to dominate high-value markets.

name: Turborepo & Semantic Versioning
desc: Integrate Turborepo, release-please, and Helm to automate semantic versioning and eliminate monorepo deployment friction.

name: Deep Proxy Interception (mitmproxy)
desc: Upgrade proxy workflow with mitmproxy to inject local Heady CA cert into Windsurf, forcing 100% of WebSocket and HTTP/2 traffic through HeadyConductor to fix Issue #43.

name: Shift-Left Monte Carlo Validation
desc: Create a local git hook to run a lightweight Monte Carlo simulation on local commits or large AI generation, rendering 'Deployment Risk Score' in IDE.

name: AST-Aware 'Arena Merge'
desc: Equip nodes to parse the Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) of conflicting branches to logically resolve parallel Arena Merge conflicts without breaking code structure.

name: LSP Integration for BRAIN
desc: Equip the BRAIN node with an LSP client (pygls/vscode-languageserver-node) for native workspace awareness, reading cursor positions and repo-wide diagnostics.

name: OpenTelemetry Tracing for LENS
desc: Enable the CONDUCTOR to emit OpenTelemetry traces for agent hops, allowing the LENS node to render a live 3D flow map of Sacred Geometry coding tasks.

name: Policy-as-Code for SOUL (OPA/Cedar)
desc: Implement Open Policy Agent (OPA) or AWS Cedar for the SOUL node to allow millisecond-fast, deterministic vetos without consuming LLM token inference.

name: GraphRAG Spatial Mapping for MEMORY
desc: Equip the MEMORY node with an MCP connection to a Knowledge Graph (Neo4j/Memgraph) to map relationships spatially across concepts, replacing linear vector queries.

name: Durable Execution for INTELLIGENCE (Temporal.io)
desc: Wrap the INTELLIGENCE node's parallel DAG scheduler in Temporal.io to prevent race conditions and seamlessly resume paused multi-agent refactors.

name: eBPF System Tracing for LENS
desc: Enable LENS to perform OS kernel-level tracing using eBPF (Cilium/Pixie) for zero-overhead observability across network requests and data structures.

name: Deploy CPU Command Center
desc: Deploy LiteLLM, Redis, Cloudflared, Uptime Kuma, Dozzle, and Watchtower to /opt/heady-stack on Bossgame node.

name: Configure LiteLLM Gateway Routing
desc: Apply configs/cmd-center-litellm.yaml to route Tier 1 to Colab Pro nodes and Tier 2 failover to Groq.

name: Configure Uptime Kuma Hub
desc: Setup Uptime Kuma monitors for Colab node health checks and configure alerting to Slack/Discord.

name: Secure Control Plane IP
desc: Ensure routing logic and business IP are isolated behind firewall and Cloudflare Tunnel on the physical Mini PC.

name: Expose Status Dashboard
desc: Write Cloudflared config block to securely expose Uptime Kuma (port 3001) to the internet via Zero Trust login.

name: Mycelial Context Sharing Protocol
desc: Surpass OpenAI's shared context by implementing fractal, mycelial memory where agents organically absorb context from adjacent workflows without rigid API schemas.

name: Sub-Swarm Autonomous Compute Bidding
desc: Obsolete centralized orchestration (Frontier) by allowing Heady nodes to dynamically bid on and negotiate compute resources via token-burn autonomously.

name: Quantum DOM Prediction Engine
desc: Surpass OpenAI Operator's sequential UI clicking by analyzing the DOM AST to probabilistically predict and execute 3-hop interactions concurrently.

name: Real-Time Synaptic Pruning
desc: Go beyond Frontier's evaluation loops by dynamically pruning unused vector paths and physically re-weighting memory connections during live sessions.

name: Homomorphic Encryption Reasoning
desc: Obliterate enterprise privacy limits by enabling the BRAIN to perform multi-hop reasoning over cryptographically encrypted memory states without decryption.

name: Ambient IoT Mesh Manifestation
desc: Extend agents beyond screen-based enterprise workflows by mapping Heady decisions into physical ambient IoT states within the HeadyConnection network.

name: Implement Lookahead Routing
desc: Implement Speculative Execution and high-speed predictive router for the DAG scheduler to pre-warm contexts and reduce TTFT latency.

name: Fractal GraphRAG & Golden Ratio Context Decay
desc: Layer Knowledge Graph over Vector Embeddings. Implement logarithmic token-shedding algorithm based on the Golden Ratio (1.618).

name: Real-Time Constitutional Interception
desc: Run SOUL module as an isolated TEE intercepting output stream token-by-token and triggering dynamic fine-tuning on drift.

name: WASM Local-First SLMs
desc: Compile quantized Small Language Models to WebAssembly/WebGPU within HeadyOS for offline, local-first execution.

name: Cryptographically Verifiable Impact Ledger
desc: Build an immutable cryptographic log (Merkle-tree PostgreSQL/Amazon QLDB) API tracking compute/revenue routed to non-profits.

name: Compute for Good Decentralization
desc: Develop opt-in distributed computing feature in HeadyOS, orchestrating idle GPUs for non-profit data processing.

name: Continuous Chaos Engineering
desc: Implement chaos testing to randomly terminate nodes or inject latency to mathematically guarantee automated rerouting.

name: Open-Source HeadyMCP Plugins
desc: Open-source the HeadyMCP repository to encourage third-party developers to build plugins for external tools.

name: 3D WebGL Topology Visualization
desc: Implement a real-time WebGL/Three.js node visualizer in HeadyMe Admin Center using a Golden Spiral layout.

name: Semantic Arena Merge
desc: Upgrade Arena Merge to use the BRAIN for Semantic Merging to intelligently resolve Git syntax collisions based on intent.

name: Architectural Integrity Scan
desc: Scan repository structure for god classes, tight coupling, and outdated dependencies. Review state management and enforce DRY modules.

name: Performance & Scalability Optimization
desc: Analyze code for O(N^2) loops, missing caching (Redis), excessive API calls, resource leaks, and unoptimized assets.

name: Security Hardening (Zero-Trust)
desc: Identify attack vectors based on OWASP Top 10. Check input validation, missing RBAC, hardcoded secrets, and PII exposure.

name: Database & Data Layer Review
desc: Scan all ORM calls and raw SQL to fix N+1 query problems. Analyze schema for missing indexes and evaluate connection pooling.

name: Code Quality & Maintainability Audit
desc: Assess error handling coverage, strict typing, linting rules, naming conventions, and eliminate magic numbers.

name: DevOps, CI/CD, & Observability Setup
desc: Review Dockerfiles for multi-stage builds and security. Enhance CI/CD pipelines with SAST, linting, tests, and APM telemetry.

name: Scrub Git History of Secrets
desc: Use git filter-repo or BFG Repo-Cleaner to completely scrub .env.hybrid and heady-manager.js.bak from Git history.

name: Consolidate Build Workflows
desc: Deprecate four hcautobuild scripts into a single parameterized GitHub Action or Taskfile/Makefile.

name: Add Automated Secret Scanning
desc: Add TruffleHog or GitHub Advanced Security to instantly fail builds if secrets are pushed.

name: Implementation of SAST Scanning
desc: Add CodeQL or Semgrep to ci.yml for cross-language vulnerability detection.

name: Post-Deploy Smoke Testing Node
desc: Add automated health check step in deploy-render.yml to verify orchestrator boot.

name: Modularize Orchestration Logic
desc: Replace simple JS promises with LangGraph.js or XState to prevent race conditions and manage state.

name: Implement OpenTelemetry
desc: Add OpenTelemetry Node for real-time visualization of agent-to-tool traces.

name: Add AST Parser MCP Skill
desc: Equip agents with Tree-sitter AST parsing skill to safely refactor monolithic 90KB files like heady-manager.js.

name: Add Headless Browser MCP Skill
desc: Add Playwright or Puppeteer MCP server for visual QA and DOM reading of generated sites.

name: Add Semantic Graph Memory MCP
desc: Equip the orchestrator with Neo4j, Memgraph, or pgvector/ChromaDB for spatial relationship mapping.

name: Refactor heady-manager.js and Test Directory
desc: Break down heady-manager.js into smaller modules and move root-level tests into tests/ directory.

desc: Simulate 24-hr key rotation lifecycle for ML-KEM-768 seed generators (Task ID Alpha-5964)

name: Audit Handshake Latency [Zone 9]
desc: Measure SSL/mTLS overhead added by PQC encapsulation phase (Task ID Alpha-4420)

desc: Rebalance HNSW vector index for conversation memory semantic search (Task ID Alpha-6676)
